name: Tunnel Balls Rush
description:
Swipe left or right to jump the ball, You can go infinite left or right.

Avoid the gaps otherwise you will fall and game over, So Go Infinite and see how far you can go!

Addictive gameplay mechanics with One-tap easy-to-learn controls.

◉ Collect GEMS to unlock BALLS.
◉ Receive FREE Gifts Awards.
◉ 60+ cool BALLS to unlock!
◉ Compare your high score with players worldwide.
◉ Great Achievements to achieve.
◉ Challenging but with practice, easy to master.

Download now and experience Exciting Adventure!!!

Please Rate and Review to show your love/comments!

Thanks
